transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, namaste.
Customer: Namaskar sir, namaskar. Hello.
Executive: Sir ji, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas theek hai sir.
Executive: Badhiya hai sir. Prashant bol raha hu sir, main IndiaMART se senior manager. Wo kal baat hui thi sham ko pehle.
Customer: Haan. Office mein aaunga, bol dunga 4 baje.
Executive: 4:00 baje. 4:00 baje. Ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, kal bhi yahi hua tha sir. Sham ko aapne bola tha, fir meeting kar nahi paaye. Ghar pe aaye hue ho na sir aap?
Customer: To 4:00-4:15 baje office bolunga, tabhi main connect karunga, laptop leke jaunga office.
Executive: Sure hai na aaj baat ho jayegi aapse?
Customer: Bilkul 100% baat hogi.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Chaliye, main connect karta hu aapko.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Theek hai. Chaliye, dhanyavaad sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer couldn't attend meeting yesterday.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect at 4:00-4:15 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect at 4:00-4:15 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, schedule, follow-up
